summary: 1999 DODGE INTREPID.     DRIVER'S SIDE WINDOW:  CONTINUOUSLY GETS OFF-TRACK.     DIRVER'S SEAT:  1-SEAT FALLS BACK   2-SEAT AT SEMI-RECLINE POSITION.     FRONT SEAT PASSENGER DOOR LOCK:  1-OFTEN WILL NOT UNLOCK WITH KEY;   2-WILL UNLOCK ONLY AFTER  ELECTRONIC LOCK/UNLOCK BUTTON  ON DRIVER'S SIDE IS USED AND THEN MANUALLY LIFTING FRONT PASSENGER DOOR LOCK; AND    3-WHEN USING THE ELECTRONIC LOCK/ UNLOCK BUTTON A TERRIBLE LOUD NOISE IS HEARD.  I DO NOT KNOW WHAT, "OEM" IS OR MEANS, THEREFORE I DON'T KNOW HOW TO PROPERLY ANSWER THE QUESTIONS REFERRING TO THE OEM BLOCK.   *JB
